item.title: Florida Mayor Drops Threat to Evict Cinema Over Showing of ‘No Other Land’
item.description: After an emotional city meeting, the mayor of Miami Beach dropped his effort to end a theater’s lease over its showing of “No Other Land.”

item.title: The Judiciary’s Role
item.description: We cover President Trump and his latest adversary: the courts.

item.title: Israeli Forces Expand ‘Targeted Ground Activities’ in Gaza Strip
item.description: The military said it had seized part of a major corridor that separates the enclave’s northern half from the south.
